main event: A round, metallic object about 12-15 feet in diameter was observed hovering and moving horizontally without any sound in Newman, Georgia on December 6, 1966.
interesting points: The object had a bright light on top and would occasionally change color from bright white to blue-green.
The object was observed for about 30 minutes by two witnesses who were familiar with aircraft and did not recognize this object.
The object eventually climbed straight up and disappeared from sight.
There was no indication of propulsion and no sound was heard during the sighting.
The weather was clear with good visibility at the time of the observation.
sighted object: a round, metallic object about 12-15 feet in diameter
